"Cortes": "That's it! That's the spirit! Let me explain what I'll have you do."
"It's like a... floating... spikey... Photon clump... thing!"
"Anyways, the important part is that when you smack a Cold Photon, they explode."
"I want you to try gathering a bunch of enemies in one area and wiping 'em all out with one of those."
"It might be hard at the beginning, but go give it a try."
